# solidHorizontalGridLineMask

**Type Property**

Specifies that horizontal grid lines should be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
static var solidHorizontalGridLineMask: NSTableView.GridLineStyle { get }
```

## Constants

- **solidVerticalGridLineMask**: Specifies that vertical grid lines should be displayed.
- **dashedHorizontalGridLineMask**: Specifies that the horizontal grid lines should be drawn dashed.

items.description: Specifies that vertical grid lines should be displayed.
items.name: solidVerticalGridLineMask

items.description: Specifies that the horizontal grid lines should be drawn dashed.
items.name: dashedHorizontalGridLineMask
